00030 /**
00031  * Abstract class: this is the superclass for all Apple Push Notification Service
00032  * classes.
00033  *
00034  * This class is responsible for the connection to the Apple Push Notification Service
00035  * and Feedback.
00036  *
00037  * @ingroup ApplePushNotificationService
00038  * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationService
00039  */
00040 abstract class ApnsPHP_Abstract
00041 {
00042     const ENVIRONMENT_PRODUCTION = 0; /**< @type integer Production environment. */
00043     const ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX = 1; /**< @type integer Sandbox environment. */
00044 
00045     const DEVICE_BINARY_SIZE = 32; /**< @type integer Device token length. */
00046 
00047     const CONNECT_RETRY_INTERVAL = 1000000; /**< @type integer Default connect retry interval in micro seconds. */
00048     const SOCKET_SELECT_TIMEOUT = 1000000; /**< @type integer Default socket select timeout in micro seconds. */
00049 
00050     protected $_aServiceURLs = array(); /**< @type array Container for service URLs environments. */
00051 
00052     protected $_nEnvironment; /**< @type integer Active environment. */
00053 
00054     protected $_nConnectTimeout; /**< @type integer Connect timeout in seconds. */
00055     protected $_nConnectRetryTimes = 3; /**< @type integer Connect retry times. */
00056 
00057     protected $_sProviderCertificateFile; /**< @type string Provider certificate file with key (Bundled PEM). */
00058     protected $_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile; /**< @type string Root certification authority file. */
00059 
00060     protected $_nConnectRetryInterval; /**< @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds. */
00061     protected $_nSocketSelectTimeout; /**< @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds. */
00062 
00063     protected $_logger; /**< @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Logger. */
00064 
00065     protected $_hSocket; /**< @type resource SSL Socket. */
00066 
00067     /**
00068      * Constructor.
00069      *
00070      * @param  $nEnvironment @type integer Environment.
00071      * @param  $sProviderCertificateFile @type string Provider certificate file
00072      *         with key (Bundled PEM).
00073      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if the environment is not
00074      *         sandbox or production or the provider certificate file is not readable.
00075      */
00076     public function __construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile)
00077     {
00078         if ($nEnvironment != self::ENVIRONMENT_PRODUCTION && $nEnvironment != self::ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX) {
00079             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00080                 "Invalid environment '{$nEnvironment}'"
00081             );
00082         }
00083         $this->_nEnvironment = $nEnvironment;
00084 
00085         if (!is_readable($sProviderCertificateFile)) {
00086             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00087                 "Unable to read certificate file '{$sProviderCertificateFile}'"
00088             );
00089         }
00090         $this->_sProviderCertificateFile = $sProviderCertificateFile;
00091 
00092         $this->_nConnectTimeout = ini_get("default_socket_timeout");
00093         $this->_nConnectRetryInterval = self::CONNECT_RETRY_INTERVAL;
00094         $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout = self::SOCKET_SELECT_TIMEOUT;
00095     }
00096 
00097     /**
00098      * Set the Logger instance to use for logging purpose.
00099      *
00100      * The default logger is ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded, an instance
00101      * of ApnsPHP_Log_Interface that simply print to standard
00102      * output log messages.
00103      *
00104      * To set a custom logger you have to implement ApnsPHP_Log_Interface
00105      * and use setLogger, otherwise standard logger will be used.
00106      *
00107      * @see ApnsPHP_Log_Interface
00108      * @see ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded
00109      *
00110      * @param  $logger @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Logger instance.
00111      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if Logger is not an instance
00112      *         of ApnsPHP_Log_Interface.
00113      */
00114     public function setLogger(ApnsPHP_Log_Interface $logger)
00115     {
00116         if (!is_object($logger)) {
00117             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00118                 "The logger should be an instance of 'ApnsPHP_Log_Interface'"
00119             );
00120         }
00121         if (!($logger instanceof ApnsPHP_Log_Interface)) {
00122             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00123                 "Unable to use an instance of '" . get_class($logger) . "' as logger: " .
00124                 "a logger must implements ApnsPHP_Log_Interface."
00125             );
00126         }
00127         $this->_logger = $logger;
00128     }
00129 
00130     /**
00131      * Get the Logger instance.
00132      *
00133      * @return @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Current Logger instance.
00134      */
00135     public function getLogger()
00136     {
00137         return $this->_logger;
00138     }
00139 
00140     /**
00141      * Set the Root Certification Authority file.
00142      *
00143      * Setting the Root Certification Authority file automatically set peer verification
00144      * on connect.
00145      *
00146      * @see http://tinyurl.com/GeneralProviderRequirements
00147      * @see http://www.entrust.net/
00148      * @see https://www.entrust.net/downloads/root_index.cfm
00149      *
00150      * @param  $sRootCertificationAuthorityFile @type string Root Certification
00151      *         Authority file.
00152      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if Root Certification Authority
00153      *         file is not readable.
00154      */
00155     public function setRootCertificationAuthority($sRootCertificationAuthorityFile)
00156     {
00157         if (!is_readable($sRootCertificationAuthorityFile)) {
00158             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00159                 "Unable to read Certificate Authority file '{$sRootCertificationAuthorityFile}'"
00160             );
00161         }
00162         $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile = $sRootCertificationAuthorityFile;
00163     }
00164 
00165     /**
00166      * Get the Root Certification Authority file path.
00167      *
00168      * @return @type string Current Root Certification Authority file path.
00169      */
00170     public function getCertificateAuthority()
00171     {
00172         return $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile;
00173     }
00174 
00175     /**
00176      * Set the connection timeout.
00177      *
00178      * The default connection timeout is the PHP internal value "default_socket_timeout".
00179      * @see http://php.net/manual/en/filesystem.configuration.php
00180      *
00181      * @param  $nTimeout @type integer Connection timeout in seconds.
00182      */
00183     public function setConnectTimeout($nTimeout)
00184     {
00185         $this->_nConnectTimeout = (int)$nTimeout;
00186     }
00187 
00188     /**
00189      * Get the connection timeout.
00190      *
00191      * @return @type integer Connection timeout in seconds.
00192      */
00193     public function getConnectTimeout()
00194     {
00195         return $this->_nConnectTimeout;
00196     }
00197 
00198     /**
00199      * Set the connect retry times value.
00200      *
00201      * If the client is unable to connect to the server retries at least for this
00202      * value. The default connect retry times is 3.
00203      *
00204      * @param  $nRetryTimes @type integer Connect retry times.
00205      */
00206     public function setConnectRetryTimes($nRetryTimes)
00207     {
00208         $this->_nConnectRetryTimes = (int)$nRetryTimes;
00209     }
00210 
00211     /**
00212      * Get the connect retry time value.
00213      *
00214      * @return @type integer Connect retry times.
00215      */
00216     public function getConnectRetryTimes()
00217     {
00218         return $this->_nConnectRetryTimes;
00219     }
00220 
00221     /**
00222      * Set the connect retry interval.
00223      *
00224      * If the client is unable to connect to the server retries at least for ConnectRetryTimes
00225      * and waits for this value between each attempts.
00226      *
00227      * @see setConnectRetryTimes
00228      *
00229      * @param  $nRetryInterval @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds.
00230      */
00231     public function setConnectRetryInterval($nRetryInterval)
00232     {
00233         $this->_nConnectRetryInterval = (int)$nRetryInterval;
00234     }
00235 
00236     /**
00237      * Get the connect retry interval.
00238      *
00239      * @return @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds.
00240      */
00241     public function getConnectRetryInterval()
00242     {
00243         return $this->_nConnectRetryInterval;
00244     }
00245 
00246     /**
00247      * Set the TCP socket select timeout.
00248      *
00249      * After writing to socket waits for at least this value for read stream to
00250      * change status.
00251      *
00252      * In Apple Push Notification protocol there isn't a real-time
00253      * feedback about the correctness of notifications pushed to the server; so after
00254      * each write to server waits at least SocketSelectTimeout. If, during this
00255      * time, the read stream change its status and socket received an end-of-file
00256      * from the server the notification pushed to server was broken, the server
00257      * has closed the connection and the client needs to reconnect.
00258      *
00259      * @see http://php.net/stream_select
00260      *
00261      * @param  $nSelectTimeout @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds.
00262      */
00263     public function setSocketSelectTimeout($nSelectTimeout)
00264     {
00265         $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout = (int)$nSelectTimeout;
00266     }
00267 
00268     /**
00269      * Get the TCP socket select timeout.
00270      *
00271      * @return @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds.
00272      */
00273     public function getSocketSelectTimeout()
00274     {
00275         return $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout;
00276     }
00277 
00278     /**
00279      * Connects to Apple Push Notification service server.
00280      *
00281      * Retries ConnectRetryTimes if unable to connect and waits setConnectRetryInterval
00282      * between each attempts.
00283      *
00284      * @see setConnectRetryTimes
00285      * @see setConnectRetryInterval
00286      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if is unable to connect after
00287      *         ConnectRetryTimes.
00288      */
00289     public function connect()
00290     {
00291         $bConnected = false;
00292         $nRetry = 0;
00293         while (!$bConnected) {
00294             try {
00295                 $bConnected = $this->_connect();
00296             } catch (ApnsPHP_Exception $e) {
00297                 if ($nRetry >= $this->_nConnectRetryTimes) {
00298                     throw $e;
00299                 } else {
00300                     $this->_log('ERROR: ' . $e->getMessage());
00301                     $this->_log(
00302                         "INFO: Retry to connect (" . ($nRetry+1) .
00303                         "/{$this->_nConnectRetryTimes})..."
00304                     );
00305                     usleep($this->_nConnectRetryInterval);
00306                 }
00307             }
00308             $nRetry++;
00309         }
00310     }
00311 
00312     /**
00313      * Disconnects from Apple Push Notifications service server.
00314      *
00315      * @return @type boolean True if successful disconnected.
00316      */
00317     public function disconnect()
00318     {
00319         if (is_resource($this->_hSocket)) {
00320             $this->_log('INFO: Disconnected.');
00321             return fclose($this->_hSocket);
00322         }
00323         return false;
00324     }
00325 
00326     /**
00327      * Connects to Apple Push Notification service server.
00328      *
00329      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if is unable to connect.
00330      * @return @type boolean True if successful connected.
00331      */
00332     protected function _connect()
00333     {
00334         $sURL = $this->_aServiceURLs[$this->_nEnvironment];
00335         unset($aURLs);
00336 
00337         $this->_log("INFO: Trying {$sURL}...");
00338 
00339         /**
00340          * @see http://php.net/manual/en/context.ssl.php
00341          */
00342         $streamContext = stream_context_create(array('ssl' => array(
00343             'verify_peer' => isset($this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile),
00344             'cafile' => $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile,
00345             'local_cert' => $this->_sProviderCertificateFile
00346         )));
00347 
00348         $this->_hSocket = @stream_socket_client($sURL, $nError, $sError,
00349             $this->_nConnectTimeout, STREAM_CLIENT_CONNECT, $streamContext);
00350 
00351         if (!$this->_hSocket) {
00352             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00353                 "Unable to connect to '{$sURL}': {$sError} ({$nError})"
00354             );
00355         }
00356 
00357         stream_set_blocking($this->_hSocket, 0);
00358         stream_set_write_buffer($this->_hSocket, 0);
00359 
00360         $this->_log("INFO: Connected to {$sURL}.");
00361 
00362         return true;
00363     }
00364 
00365     /**
00366      * Logs a message through the Logger.
00367      *
00368      * @param  $sMessage @type string The message.
00369      */
00370     protected function _log($sMessage)
00371     {
00372         if (!isset($this->_logger)) {
00373             $this->_logger = new ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded();
00374         }
00375         $this->_logger->log($sMessage);
00376     }
00377 }
